features: ✅【Ultra HD 1080p Resolution & Clear Night Vision】Mini size but excellent picture, with 1080P HD resolution, This in room camera displays a crystal clear smooth live video. With built-in IR LEDs, night vision up to 32ft (10m) in pitch-black, you can keep an eye on your home anytime anywhere. This night vision camera only supports 2.4GHz WiFi.

✅【24/7 Motion+Sound Detection & Smart Siren】The camera for home is equipped with an advanced detection algorithm that automatically captures snapshots and records video when it detects motion or sound, and sends alerts to your phone immediately. so you can see what's happening in real time and makes it easy to keep your home safe. This mini security camera in door is ideal for elder/baby monitors, dog cameras and nanny cams. Everyone that has an apartment should have this home security camera.

✅【Two-Way Audio & Respond Quickly】This pet camera with phone app is fitted with built-in anti-noise mic and speaker that lets you talk or listen to family member, friends, pets, visitors, couriers or chase away intruders in a distance. The home camera indoor provides One-Touch call function for quick calling.

✅【Secure Local SD Card & Cloud Storage】Enjoy storing up to 128GB of SD (not included). Store and record daily events and keep your home safe. With Tuya app, it will catch alert videos/images on cloud storage(sold separately), and you can go back and watch these videos all the time. The indoor camera offer multiple security protocols to keep your data and privacy secure. No one could access to your information without your permission.

✅【A Perfect Gift for the Holidays】This indoor security camera wifi camera for room looks lovely and stylish, practical and durable, especially suitable for Christmas, Halloween, Thanksgiving, New Year as a gift to your loved ones, record the beautiful moments of life. Dog caemra Pet camera night vision also great for families with pets for easy care.

How to connect the camera Previous page Next page This indoor security camera wifi camera for room looks lovely and stylish, suitable for Christmas, Halloween, Thanksgiving, Birthday, Mother's Day as a gift to your loved ones, record the beautiful moments of life. Camera size: 2.1 x 1.65 x 2.56 inch

Why can't I connect to my wifi? Does the 5G network work? Only supports 2.4GHz wifi, not 5g connection. When connecting, make sure the location of the device is within the wifi coverage area, note that the wifi password is correct, and the distance between the phone, router and the device should be close. Does it need to remain plugged in? Yes. This camera is plugged in for use (equipped with a Type-C cable about 40.5 inches). Why does It says this is a wireless camera but still need plug in？ Conventional cameras generally need two kinds of cable, power cable and signal cable. This "wireless" means no signal cable, but still need the power cord, is for wireless camera power supply. Where is the QR code, I did not see it on the package box? The QR code is displayed on your mobile device, not on the package nor on the instruction manual. After entering wifi on the APP, your mobile screen will show the QR code, then use the camera to scan the QR code to connect. How to recognize the status of the indicator light? How to see if a camera is connected? When plugging in, the indicator light is red. When ready to connect, the indicator light is flashing red. After scanning the QR code, the indicator light is flashing blue. When connected successfully, the indicator light is blue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I needed this for my dog, to watch him while im gone and he can hear my voice, he has separation anxiety. So its doing its job just fine. It was kind of a pain to set up because you have to have 2.4G wifi not 5.G wifi to connect. But if you mess with it a bit i figured a way through Bluetooth to still somehow set it up. Also the quality isn't that good but it could be phone and lighting. And Doesn't rotate. But as i said, this small camera is doing its job for me and my dog. And at a good price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t work correctly
reviews.reviewText: The camera is hard to setup. It will not scan the QR code, it took me over 15 times of resetting the camera for it to finally scan the QR code. Then every 2 days the camera goes offline and doesn’t work. This is not a problem with my wifi or router. I have to completely remove the camera from the app and repair it , which takes about 10-20 tries to get it to rescan the QR code for it to work again, then 2 days later offline again. I would suggest saving your time and investing in a higher quality camera. They even sent me a replacement camera but it’s having the same exact problems so it’s not ideal when the camera keeps disconnecting and going offline every 2 days. What is the point or benefit from having a camera if I am away from home just for it to go offline?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality: I use when I travel.
reviews.reviewText: It's been incredibly valuable during my travels. I use my phones wifi and a battery to power this device, in my car when necessary. Sometimes I place it in the window of the airbnb, hotel, motel, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Difficult for me to set up.
reviews.reviewText: Got this to see what my cats are up to. Took a bit of time to figure it out. Kind of difficult to set up but picture is good, it does a good enough job for as cheap as it was.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good so far!!
reviews.reviewText: Good item, easy to use and as pictured

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Won’t get past the setup stage. I fought with this camera for an hour. I’m done. Stay away it’s complete garbage

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good little camera
reviews.reviewText: I got this camera to check on my puppy during the day. It’s clear and is the same as many of my smart plugs so all on one app is nice. Only drawback is I can’t talk through it but for some reason you can call? My puppy doesn’t answer so not sure if that works 🤪
